text: Harsusi is a Semitic language. It is spoken by fewer than 1,000 people in the deserts of South-Central Oman. It is a lot like Mehri.Peterson, J.E. "Oman's Diverse Society: Southern Oman." In: Middle East Journal 58.2, 254-269. ==References== Category:Semitic languages Category:Languages of Oman Category:Endangered languages
title: Harsusi language
